properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.nodes
properties.description: Set host and port fields of Cassandra Cluster which are required to connect.

properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.keyspace
properties.description: Set keyspace field to specify which keyspace to be used.

properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.sql
properties.description: Set sql fields like “select” to create template queries or commands.
